registry.name: Gold
registry.description: A valuable currency used for trading and construction.

registry.name: Science
registry.description: Knowledge points used to unlock new technologies.

registry.name: Water
registry.description: Essential for life and many industrial processes.

registry.name: Salts
registry.description: A mixture of sodium chloride and magnesium chloride, useful in chemical processes.

registry.name: Coal
registry.description: A combustible black rock used as fuel and in industrial processes.

registry.description: Raw ore containing iron, used for smelting into iron.

registry.name: Iron
registry.description: A strong metal used in construction and manufacturing.

registry.name: Copper Ore
registry.description: Raw ore containing copper, used for smelting into copper.

registry.name: Copper
registry.description: A malleable metal used in wiring and machinery.

registry.name: Quartz
registry.description: A crystalline mineral used in glassmaking and electronics.

registry.name: Crystal
registry.description: A shard of quartz imbued with mystical properties.

registry.name: Glass
registry.description: A transparent material made from quartz, used in construction and containers.

registry.name: Titanium Ore
registry.description: Raw ore containing titanium, used for smelting into titanium.

registry.name: Titanium
registry.description: A strong, lightweight metal used in advanced manufacturing.

registry.name: Silicon
registry.description: A metalloid used in electronics and glassmaking.

registry.name: Magnesium
registry.description: A lightweight metal used in alloys and chemical processes.

registry.name: Sulfur
registry.description: A yellow element used in chemical manufacturing and fertilizers.

registry.name: Sulfuric Acid
registry.description: A strong acid used in industrial and chemical processes.

registry.name: Battery
registry.description: A device for storing and providing electrical energy.

registry.name: Lye
registry.description: A caustic solution used in soap making and chemical processes.

registry.name: Corn
registry.description: A versatile crop used for food and industrial products.

registry.name: Oil
registry.description: A viscous liquid used as fuel and in chemical manufacturing.

registry.name: Stardust
registry.description: A rare and mystical material with unknown properties.

registry.name: Sunstone
registry.description: A radiant gem imbued with solar energy.

registry.name: Moonstone
registry.description: A luminous gem with mysterious lunar properties.

registry.name: Mythril
registry.description: A legendary, lightweight, and incredibly strong metal prized by master craftsmen.
